main event: An object the size of a peanut was observed on the ground radar in Hamilton, Ohio, confirming a UFO sighting for 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was detected by ground radar and visually confirmed,The object's course was slightly irregular,The sighting consisted of one object,The duration of the observation was between 10-15 minutes,Comments indicated that the flight path and duration were consistent with missile firings from the site.
sighted object: one object size of a peanut
